website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and durable women's boot. Good option for a military service boot when serving in different climates and conditions.
pros: The GORE-TEX lining naturally wicks away moisture to keep feet dry
Delivers great ankle support for a safe and friction-free stride
PU Monowrap midsole frame provides stability and support
cons: Lacks speed hooks, which are preferred by hikers

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14 in most shoes especially Nike and size 14 of these fit perfect. It's crazy how comfortable they are. Honestly they are the most comfortable footwear I have ever worn including sneakers and boots. Also, what struck me as so incredibly odd is how awesome they regulate temperature. In 70 degree weather I'm not hot in them and in 10 degree weather I'm not cold. All with basic cotton socks. If these ever go on sale.i might have to buy a few eztra pairs for presents. They are that awesome. I have not tested them in water but gore text doesn't lie. Best boot ever hands down.
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this pair of boots. I wasn't familiar with the brand but these are as good as my North Face, Merrill, and Solomon. I really like the lace design. You can fully tighten the laces by pulling the string ends. I have walked about 200 miles with these boots and couldn't be happier. They are also true to size. The size 10's fit perfectly. I've had some size issues with some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JDRanger

customer_reviews.title: The search is over!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn boots on a few continents from jungle terrain to desert and mountains. The review are true. This boot put a "pep in my step" and made me feel like running a race or getting back into action again. I know, sounds crazy...truly a solid statement. These boots are engineered so that they make you more efficient and they encourage movement. Water proof, and so good I want them for my edc load out. Have to make myself wear other shoes to mix it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!  Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I put a few miles on these before submitting a review. Before embarking on a 3-day hunt, I took these boots out on a few day hikes to break them in. Totally unnecessary. The fit was great and there were not hot spots or discomfort. The first hike I did was about 8 miles with 2500' elevation gain. The boots did great, and the extra plastic support definitely saved me a twisted ankle and I was hiking down some rocky terrain. The sole is a softer rubber, and it is not the grippiest boot, but I think this adds to the comfort. Walking over sharp rocks did not over contort the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best boots i have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Best boots i have ever worn. I have had the nike sfb boots, rocky SV2 and the rocky c4t. They are a 6 in boot so if you have to blouse your boots it is going to be a change on how you do that. They are super light for what they lok like they should be. I come home after work and my feet still feel great after being in them all day. The only negative is the price but they are worth every penny. If you are on the fence just order them you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: First Pair of Lowas
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends, who was a Marine Corps Officer has these boots. I liked the style and i knew that if he had them, they must be a good quality. I have not been disappointed. Fit like a glove. Your foot slips right in, then they feel snug once you lace them up. I am trying to find a way to justify to myself buying another pair, so i can have one for outdoor stuff and one set to wear around and stay clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit fine and are very comfortable, but after less than 1 year, using it one weekend a month, part of the plastic began to separate from the leather, by the outside part of the boot, near the tip. I tried with glue, but probably it was not the recommended one. Does it happen regularly? Enrique Nevett
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Nevett Gimón

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these type of shoes I have purchased from Lowa. Have been a Lowa fan for a long time. However, this pair has not held up as previous pairs have. I have a lot of ankle issues so wear orthotics and soft ankle brace. Within a couple of months I noticed having to lace the shoe up tighter an tighter just to keep foot from slopping around inside. Find myself rolling my ankle for frequently and having general discomfort issues. Seems the strength of the shoe is breaking down ( if that makes sense). Also they are no longer water repellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he says they are well worth the money. He also said they were a bit more raised than he thought but it's very hard to turn your ankle towards the inside (in case of twisting ankles) he had the wear them the day after we got them and he had no issues with comfort which is true to the product stating that they are a zero break in boot. Overall extremely happy with the product. You really get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and held up against a lot of weather
customer_reviews.text: Durable, comfortable, and held up against a lot of weather. Worn during a deployment. Had issues with the lace rivets. That keeps them out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Oaktownpull

customer_reviews.title: really decent boots, bring your own insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Cant give it full marks because the insoles that come with are just little flat pieces of rubber, but once i put some scholls in there they felt amazing. No cramps afterwards, no blisters in the break in phase even with the flat rubber. Cant make a judgement on long hikes but 2-3 miles in them are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots. I wear them for work and outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots. I wear them for work and outdoor play. The soft soles are very quiet if you are using them for hunting I highly recommend. They are expensive and other boots last longer but if you can afford them go for it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lomino

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I had for quite a while
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3-pairs, 2 green 1-sand. I started using the sand on Monday and by Thursday I've already walked more than 19-miles. That's how good these boots are! Light-weight, true to size (I wear a 14-US). Came from Keens where the toe area was wider however much heavier; the boot is snug and feels great. My biggest fear now is that Lowa will screw up and stop making them. I'm the owner of Iron Creek Photography, a landscape, nature and wildlife photographer I travel a lot hiking into all types of conditions and places and these are now my boots I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don Libby

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely happy and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: You won't buy another brand after trying those Lowa GTX boots.I can't say enough about it, so trust me and go get it. I don't know how other Lowa boots would be but I'm not even ready to try a different Lowa kind. I'm completely happy and satisfied. No one can get me any better boots!
customer_reviews.author: Haythem

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad boot but they will cause hot spots on your ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad boot but they will cause hot spots on your feet and I had to return them because I'm a diabetic and cannot have no rubbing on my feet
customer_reviews.author: 13RWD

customer_reviews.title: Gift from the Gods
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!!! These boots are a gift from the heavens! Absolutely the best pair of boots I have ever had the chance to put on my feet. They are waterproof, lightweight, and durable. An amazing combination. These boots are highly recommended. Without a doubt the lightest waterproof boot I have ever seen. Lowa is a great brand and makes some really awesome products! I highly... Wait did I say HIGHLY! HIGHLY! recommend these boots for anyone looking for the best hiking/tactical boot. I have tried on so many different boots and brands and this boot has been the ultimate choice. Never been more happy with a pair of boots. Go buy these boots now!
customer_reviews.author: charles grossmith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for vigilante crime fighting !
customer_reviews.text: As SOON as I put these on, I loved them. I saw a guy who had posted a review previously to mine, and his review convinced me. These boots are awesome ! I just wore them to work for my first day, and I haven't even taken them off since I've been home now. They're EXTREMELY comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Remy Le Beau

customer_reviews.title: You just can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot great fit! Like everybody else states go half size bigger, Have owned and currently own more that one pair of Lowa boots. My thought on excellent footwear....your body is worth the extra money! I hate cheap footwear!! My feet and body are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: steveo

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for work and loved them so I bought another pair to wear around like them better than my keens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best boot I've tried. I work 12 hour shifts and they are great! They did take a little while to break in. I bought my other pair in tan half a size bigger in case I needed to layer socks and they fit better with no break in period.
customer_reviews.author: JSand

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and light weight. I wear in an office environment and also outdoors. They run true to size , I knocked down to 3 stars because after 1 year of office use they have two holes in them. -Air Force Officer
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. They have amazing traction in mud, snow, wet areas and rocks. Feel great but I just wish they came in wide sizes. I normally wear a 9 wide but I ordered a 9 and it's a little snug in the front. I could have ordered a 9.5 to fix that though. If you normally wear a wide shoe then go with the next half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goldhahn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boot
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have ever owned. I have had all the top brands. Haix, Redwing, Danner's highly recomend these boots. It's easy to tell the difference in a boot made in Europe when compared to say China. The quality is equal to my Heritage Redwings that are hand made here in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Kuszaj

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling light boots, but we'll see how the soles hold up after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great, only reason for 4 stars is that I really can't leave a good review until I've put them through their paces. I'll post back after a couple of hard months on the boots. They fit well, were true to size, and felt excellent right out of the box. A couple days of casually walking around in them and they felt great. Quality seems good, I'm just worried about the tread depth being somewhat shallow and them wearing down. Since they are non replaceable soles, I can clearly see at this point that the soles will grind right away with a little walking on rock. Otherwise the quality seems great, but we'll see how the tread wears.
customer_reviews.author: Trees

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth pair of these shoes that I have purchased. They are exactly what I need. Wear them to work everyday. They are also excellent hiking boots. The outside appears to get wet but the gor-tex liner keep my feet dry. Would like the soles to be a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: joe edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome boots, they fit perfectly, I can wear these all day long if I need to. Great quality, very comfortable, great support, & good for various different activities. I would recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight! I was just looking for a pair of boots to take with me out to Seattle, something not too flashy, lightweight, with gortex. These boots are great, comfortable and look really cool. Must agree with other reviews, they don't breathe a lot so if you're very uncomfortable with super warm feet, consider your size options and wear not-so-thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: great boots...i mean great
customer_reviews.text: these are boots that are just terrific. completely waterproof, and as light and comfy as a running shoe. i have a neuropathy in both feet. i depend on a shoe that will prevent foot pain. these work. period. don't balk at the price....get them!
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love these boots. I've purchased 5 pr over the last 5/6 years.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the boot & the fit is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the boot & the fit is fine but I can't say that they were worth the price for what I use them for. If I had to use them to only be trekking out in the brush then I would prefer the taller boot.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another style of boot besides the Lowa Zephyr. I have used all the colors and styles, goreTex and non-goreTex. Best shoes I have ever owned. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of these over the past 8 years. I absolutely love them. Not one complaint. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: the Best
customer_reviews.text: The only shoe ive owned that i cant destory in 3 weeks. Trust me ive bought china shoe for $150 that i broke in ten days . these German Boots r the ones. Light weight and comfy fit no breaking period and waterproof out the box
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Completely sold on this boot, they come already broken in in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: BOGEY ON UR 6

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw in the toe box
customer_reviews.text: Turns out there is a design flaw in the boot (at least the ones I bought). so the right boot caused a major irritation to my right toe just left of the pinky toe. It really was rather bothersome so I took them to shoe repair and the guy there informed me about the design flaw. there was irritation to my left toes as well just not as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Better

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boot!
customer_reviews.text: Go up half a size, wear with underarmour sage green /military socks, best combo to facilitate military ops, they breathe great. Awesome boot, worth the price and compare to the other ones out there which I tried them all, this is the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Lowa mid TF sage
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 other pairs of lowa's ,as a whole they are as advertised. I ordered these using the same size as in my hi tf boot and these feel a bit snug right out of the box. Thinking they'll loosen up a as they get broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: This is the best boot I've ever worn. I've worn the GTX boot for years. I especially like the lacing system and the color. Some GTX boots use loops, This is a more efficient system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. White

customer_reviews.title: Quality?????
customer_reviews.text: The sole is coming off of one of the boots I bought them in May 2017 I don’t wear them every day only use them for hiking and hunting You would think if you pay $200 for a pair of boots they would last for at least two years under minimal use
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: very nice boot for the money, fits like a tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: nice boot, runs a little small. but i have a wide foot. still works though. so far so good. took a couple of days to break in. IMO all insoles are junk. i always use SOLE ultra insoles. i had to use my thin ultra insoles, another words, not much room to use my normal thicker insoles.
customer_reviews.author: tricityseller

customer_reviews.title: Great traction and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these boots. Great traction and comfortable. I roll my ankles often, these don't seem to allow that to happen. Water proof, at least out of the box. I will most likely get the 8in too.
customer_reviews.author: jeff dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6' 2" SSgt in the Air Force and these boots work and feel spectacular. Blousing is not an issue nor is the color. Best boots I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Lowa makes great boots, I have the non gortex model of ...
customer_reviews.text: Lowa makes great boots, I have the non gortex model of these boots also and have worn them for 4 years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not a 5 star rating due to lack of breath-ability ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a 5 star rating due to lack of breath-ability. I was literally swimming in sweat in the boots using high quality wicking socks.
customer_reviews.author: TexasPerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots. I have put many miles on these ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots. I have put many miles on these hiking, backpacking, snowshoeing, and all sorts of other adventures. Zero blisters. Great support. Holding up well so far after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lowa zephyr gtx
customer_reviews.text: Awesome , boot fits snug, and very comfortable, got the sage color, like the green, well constructed, very light weight , good load bearing boot
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell H. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best Sage Green boot for the Air Force!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot for the Air Force uniform. I normally wear a size 9-91/2 but I went to my local REI and tried this boot on before ordering from Amazon. I had to order a size 10 so for me this boot runs a little small. The sole of the boot can be a little slick at times, so watch out for slick surfaces. The boot is definately water proof, or "puddle" proof.
customer_reviews.author: J. Evatt

customer_reviews.title: The boots fit and feel great, have had them for over a year no ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit and feel great, have had them for over a year no problems what so ever .I am a big boy 325 lbs. 6'3" they have stood up to a lot of pressure if you get what i mean.
customer_reviews.author: wayne hamilton

customer_reviews.title: ... than another Lowa boots But this boots is very good Light, well made
customer_reviews.text: Width is slight narrow than another Lowa boots But this boots is very good Light, well made, comfortable
customer_reviews.author: CY Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as expected. Very comfy. I bought this and another pair for my agents to use as law enforcement officers and they've given me great reviews on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOTS I'VE EVER HAD.
customer_reviews.text: I now own 5 pairs of Lowa Zephyrs. (Two desert high boots, one desert mid, one brown mid and the pictured sage mid) When you find some thing that works well you should stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Foster

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow- had to return them.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these- they were way too narrow for me. Reviews all stated they were very comfortable, but I could not wear these. I typically wear a D or E width. I cannot comment on the quality of the product because I am unable to use the product. I gave 3 stars, because anything less is unfair to Lowa, but it makes no sense to rate them higher. Ordering boots online is a crap shoot. I returned these and ordered Bates EE width, hopefully they will fit me better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Karl S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots. The best fitting shoes of any type ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. The best fitting shoes of any type that I've ever purchased. Haven't had them long, but they seem sturdily built and I expect they will last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: An excellent boot for hiking as well as use in the ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent boot for hiking as well as use in the other occupations where you will be on your feet all day. True to size
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Wein

customer_reviews.title: pair #6ish
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these boots for years, they are fantastic. In fact, they are the only comfortable daily hiking boots I can find. I should really buy extra pairs in case Lowa foolishly decides to stop production. They came out with a new generation of these, which are now sold at REI (they stopped selling the version I like so much) and they SUCK. I went through 2 pairs in 2 months, both of which tore from stress in the same place under normal use. So I reverted back to old reliable, which I am glad is still being made. I haven't had the Sage Green version before. It's very nice color, they match my jacket :)
customer_reviews.author: DogGeek

customer_reviews.title: One boot came apart due to weak material. I ...
customer_reviews.text: One boot came apart due to weak material. I did not get even 6 months of use out of them. Since the synthetic leather failed where the lowest lace loop is located there is no way to have it repaired. The quality of the boot does not justify the $200 they cost. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: J Willis

customer_reviews.title: amazing hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: dude. wow. Amazing. Put a nice sole in there and you're golden
customer_reviews.author: Sectas

customer_reviews.title: It's Slightly Narrower than a "D" Width Boot
customer_reviews.text: One of the best fitting boots, out of the box, I've ever owned! Lightweight and easy to wear all day, comfortably, on day one.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey 3 Gun

customer_reviews.title: Tough as a boot
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing boots ever. One pair made it 2 tours, one tour was 14 months alone.
customer_reviews.author: Purehate

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used them on warmer days elk hunting, kept my feet dry and even held up to heavy pack loads. Great boot, highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of different tactical boots, some good and some not so good. The Lowa's blow all of them away. The first time I put them on they felt like a boot that I had been wearing for a long time. Virtually no break in period on these. I recommend these highly to anyone is on their feet a good part of the day and want a boot that is both comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: James Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great All-terrain boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots while on deployment and I haven't been diappointed at all. They have help up in water, mud, snow and on the rocky terrain. I wound up in a puddle of semi-frozen water (up to my laces) and my socks remained dry! I wear them with boarding socks, so you might want to get them a little larger. Your feet will sweat some but it beats having soaked socks and boots. I definitely would buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: GI Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy them because they are Gortex lined , in years past they hadn't been. I bought them because they lace all the way to the top of the shoe. No clips for the shoe laces to catch (locking both my feet as I walk)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boots I've ever backpacked in
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review items but felt the need on these boots. Just packed 32 miles with 50+ lbs on my back in these boots. I was short on time so had very little time to break in. Most comfortable boots I've ever backpacked in.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: exceptional boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I ever had by far. True three season, extremely comfortable during long wear (10-14hrs). No issues with rain or snow, not normally hot (so I assume very good ventilation through the GoreTex), but allowing a warm sock in there without much fuss. Traction in cold conditions is fine (including on ice), wet and dry it is excellent. I can't wait to try them in truly demanding conditions, such as mountain hikes etc. I can't really fault them in any way, which is a little puzzling, as usually I have no trouble finding faults... Really handsome too, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Rods

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of the boot as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the boot as well as appearance. However, they did fit a little small so I would recommend ordering a size larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Boots made for anything
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these I've used them all over the world from Afghan mountains to Iraq desert to TN mountains to jungle training in Hawaii you can't break these boots they are amazing
customer_reviews.author: wally c holt

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. Ordered a whole size up as recommended by others. I can tell the break-in time won't be very long. Remains to be seen whether they will be too warm to wear during the summer months... being Goretex and all.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R

customer_reviews.title: Great boot well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After being highly recommended this boot from coworkers, I've got to say it was well worth the price. Comfortable straight from the box and outstanding fit and finish. The sizes run true, and so far my only complaint is that they're abit slick on tiled floor. Not too much a problem if worn in the environments they're made for.
customer_reviews.author: Esta

customer_reviews.title: We have hike in many of the National Parks and have given me good support over varied terrain
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair Of Lowa shoes I have owned. They have lasted about three years each and are worn daily. We have hike in many of the National Parks and have given me good support over varied terrain.
customer_reviews.author: William Schleizer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and extremely comfortable! Medium/light weight boot suitable for hot or temperate climates. I've worn these in climates ranging from the dry, desert-like climate of southwestern Texas to the constantly rainy southern Indiana and I've had no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these that I've purchased, looking forward to getting many miles out of them. My first pair is still in decent condition and I've had them for a couple years. And the mono wrap design almost completely eliminates the break-in period, so they are comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Cap10Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them in green and black and they came in that Air Force grayish color. So....that's not cool
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, doesn't have the quick release gromets like the older models.
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of Zephyr.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair was kind of on the small side (but still very wearable) so I ordered half a size bigger for the GTX. Only downside, the sole kind of wear quickly... other than that, my old pair look like new! Great boots well made very comfortable. Buy without fear.
customer_reviews.author: Luc Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: They were awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I took these out of the box and tried them on. Next day drove to Florida for work and for the next 10 days wore hem for 14-16 hours a day with a lot of walking and standing. They were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit my husband's foot perfectly and they are the most lightweight shoes he's ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: EJN

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable as tennis shoes & no break ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable as tennis shoes & no break in required! I'd buy another pair & recommend them to anyone! Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: ... was a requested gift for my son and he loved the boots
customer_reviews.text: It was a requested gift for my son and he loved the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Ordered for my son as I've had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Ordered for my son as I've had a pair for several years
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and true to size for me. Extremely lightweight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scott Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some commands don't allow these, tread carefully or buy the high tops..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of boots. Construction is good, waterproofing is good. One of the most comfortable pair of boots I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable, but a bit Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable shoe. I have been looking for a long time to replace my Oakley boots and my HiTecs. I would give it a 5-Star rating if the price point wasn't so high. But I am hoping they last a long time. Also, I would have liked a couple of "speed laces" at the top of the shoe for ease of getting the shoe on and off. Very comfortable, great support in the arch and ankle, and a durable toe.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband per his request. Half a year later he still raves about how much he loves these boots. I hear about it at least once a week, which means they are really good. He likes that they're more of a hiking boot look vs combat boot. Says they are so comfortable, and he should know, he walks miles per day with his k9. I definitely recommend. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a running shoe but more secure and great in the wet
customer_reviews.author: Paul Burbridge

customer_reviews.title: The boot is awesome and well made
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 and really needed a size 14. The boot is off 1 whole size in my opinion. It was no big deal though. I just returned the 13 and ordered the 14. The boot is awesome and well made. Light weight and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: ... hiking style boots and none of them felt as comfortable or looked as good
customer_reviews.text: bought same pair about 5 years ago and thought I would try something different so I looked at several comparable tactical hiking style boots and none of them felt as comfortable or looked as good. Love them so bought another pair
customer_reviews.author: Mark Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have ever worn. Support offered versus the weight are incredible. Will only be buying Lowa boots from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry O Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Lowa zephyr boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Lowa boots. I usually get 4 good years out of them. Very comfortable and easy to don and doff. Mine are used in overseas work in the Middle East and share a rotation with Salomans gtx which are also great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Don't Miss These
customer_reviews.text: Great fit great support with the comfort of your favorite tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: bought for backpacking trip
customer_reviews.text: We haven't taken the trip yet, but my husband wore these for a week to break them in. He mentioned that they made his feet warm. I don't think it was a big deal otherwise he would have probably said something more about it. Overall, these seem like good waterproof boots. The fact that they might be a little warm will be helpful when we are hiking in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Been my "go to" for over 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Been my "go to" for over 5 years. Break in is short, and virtually non existent. Super comfortable, waterproof, breathable.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best shoes I've ever owned. Very comfortable in both the snow of Switzerland and the heat of Miami. Durable, and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Westlaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best hiking shoe made. Put them on and walk away. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tighter fit than expected
customer_reviews.text: had purchased a pair previously from a UK store. even though its the same US size seams to fit much more comfortably specially towards the toe area. it could be that it being the HI cut makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Go half size larger then a sneaker. Best multipurpose footwear on the market next to nike sfb for comfort but surpasses in all other aspects
customer_reviews.author: mark galbraith

customer_reviews.title: These boots fit perfectly and are very comfortable as well as good looking
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfectly and are very comfortable as well as good looking. I would highly recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight fit my foot right.
customer_reviews.text: I had to change out insoles but these are decent boots. Still undecided if I will get again. I use theses for work all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bill volmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. I wear them daily and couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Langer

product_meta.title: Lowa Men's Zephyr GTX Mid TF Hiking Boot
product_meta.description:
Ideal for casual day hikes and weekend adventures, the LOWA Zephyr GTX Hiking Boot combines versatility with comfort. Featuring a moisture-wicking footbed, three-quarter-length nylon shank, and padded tongue and collar, these hiking boots are designed to support packs up to 25 pounds over moderate terrain.

MEN'S ZEPHYR GTX MID TF HIKING BOOT
AT A GLANCE:
 * Lightweight waterproof, breathable boots for day hikes and outdoor fitness
 * Climate control footbed wicks away moisture
 * Waterproof GORE-TEX lining reduces hot spots
 * Split leather and Cordura upper requires no break-in
 * Cross outsole provides wet and dry traction

ZEPHYR GTX MID TF
This hiking shoe features waterproof GORE-TEX lining that reduces hot spots so your feet stay comfortable.
View larger.

 The Zepher's flexible split leather and Cordura upper securely holds the foot in place, reducing strain on the toes.
View larger. 

WATERPROOF GORE-TEX KEEPS FEET DRY
 The Zephyr features a breathable, waterproof GORE-TEX lining that reduces hot spots (and the possibility of blisters). This helps your feet stay dry and comfortable in wet conditions. 

FLEXIBLE UPPER REQUIRES NO BREAK-IN
 Thanks to its flexible split leather and Cordura upper, the Zephyr requires no break-in time. The upper securely holds the foot in place to reduce strain on the toes, and the Monowrap Frame midsole technology reduces overall boot weight while providing cushioning and lateral stability. This shoe has built on gender-specific, men's and women's lasts, for optimal fit and comfort. 

CLIMATE-CONTROL FOOTBED WICKS AWAY MOISTURE
 A climate-control footbed keeps your feet cool, dry, and blister free. Perforations in the boot's lining allow air to circulate and wick moisture away from your foot, minimizing friction and fatigue. 

CROSS OUTSOLE FOR TRACTION
 The LOWA Cross outsole has a medium tread, making it ideal for pavement, smoother trails, and fitness walking. Nonslip rubber lugs provide traction on wet and dry trails. 

ABOUT LOWA
 Handcrafted in Europe for close to 90 years, LOWA boots have been acclaimed by climbers, mountaineers, and hikers as the finest outdoor boots in the world. LOWA incorporates thoughtful design and superb materials with clean, environmental manufacturing processes and fair labor standards. When you own a pair of LOWAs, you can be confident you're wearing authentic outdoor footwear that "walks the talk" when it comes to quality, performance, and sustainability. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
LOWA Men's Zephyr GTX Mid TF Hiking Boot.

ZEPHYR GTX COLLECTION
Men's Zephyr GTX LO Hiking Shoe

Women's Zephyr GTX LO Hiking Shoe

Men's Zephyr GTX Mid Hiking Boot

Men's Zephyr GTX Mid TF Hiking Boot

TRADEMARK INFORMATION:
Cordura®

PU Monowrap® Frame

GORE-TEX®



For close to 90 years, LOWA boots have been acclaimed by climbers, mountaineers and hikers as the finest outdoor boots in the world. Every LOWA boot is handcrafted in Europe, where they incorporate the elements of thoughtful design, superb materials, clean manufacturing processes and fair labor standards. When you own a pair of LOWAs, you can be confident that you're wearing authentic outdoor footwear that "walks the talk" when it comes to quality, performance and sustainability.
feature_bullets: Mixed-media hiking boot featuring looped eyelets and speed-lacing hardware
